summary: Carlos is the most prestigious tailor in Granada, but he's also a murderer in the shadows. He feels no remorse, no guilt, until Nina appears in his life and love awakens.
cast: Antonio de la Torre|Olimpia Melinte|María Alfonsa Rosso|Florin Fildan|Manolo Solo|Delphine Tempels|Gregory Brossard|Sara Da Pin Up|Cedric Sester|Carlos Aceituno|Yolanda Serrano|Francisco Conde|Luis Fernández de Eribe|Joaquín Núñez
title: Caníbal
